name: High 9 to 5
description:
Your manager, Jeff, has told your office their productivity is unacceptably low. To compensate, he's giving you more work. You must follow the prompts on your computer correctly to keep up your work levels while coping with Jeff's insults by keeping up your sanity levels. You can increase your sanity by drinking on the job, but beware the side effects... you might start to feel a little out of control.

Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.
